# Submodule Provenance

## msdf-atlas-gen
- Source: https://github.com/Chlumsky/msdf-atlas-gen
- Author: Viktor Chlumsky
- License: MIT
- Contains: msdfgen (core MSDF math library) + atlas generation tools
- We use only: msdfgen/core/ and msdfgen/ext/ (glyph shape loading, MSDF bitmap generation, FreeType integration)
- We do NOT use: atlas packing, PNG saving, CLI tool
